feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 12 Nov 2023 20:02:06
entry.summary:
Tech:
- WeWork was doomed to fail after taking on huge buildings, rival says
- A boomer on short-term disability isn't required to make student-loan payments right now. Her servicer took out $200 from her bank anyway.
- Ukraine special forces colonel played a key role in sabotaging the Nord Stream gas pipelines, a report says
- Downfall fallout lawsuit: Intel knew AVX chips were insecure and did nothing
- Indexes 101: What They Are, Why They Matter, and How to Use Them in PostgreSQL
- Absurd prompt hack brings Pepe the Frog back to DALL-E 3 for ChatGPT
- Members of the 'PayPal Mafia' include tech titans like Elon Musk, Peter Thiel, and Reid Hoffman. Here's where they are now.
- Amazon Music has several pricing tiers. Here's an overview of the features and cost.
- Experts Address Excessive Use Of Tesla Supercharger After Model 3 Dies
- This company is bringing back the stand-alone DVR—and it’s targeting cord-cutters
- AWS Announces European Sovereign Cloud for Government Agencies and Regulated Industries
- Giskard Releases Giskard Bot on HuggingFace: A Bot that Automatically Detects Issues of the Machine Learning Models You Pushed to the HuggingFace Hub
- This AI Research from China Introduces Consistent4D: A Novel Artificial Intelligence Approach for Generating 4D Dynamic Objects from Uncalibrated Monocular Videos
- This AI Paper Introduces RuLES: A New Machine Learning Framework for Assessing Rule-Adherence in Large Language Models Against Adversarial Attacks

Business:
- Mortgage Interest Rates Today, November 12, 2023 | Rates Drop From Record Highs
- 'Selling Sunset' agents are freaking out about LA's new mansion tax — but it's not just millionaires who should be worried
- Companies are likely going to invest less in employee experiences in 2024

AI:
- Dumbing down or wising up: how will generative AI change the way we think?
- Giskard Releases Giskard Bot on HuggingFace: A Bot that Automatically Detects Issues of the Machine Learning Models You Pushed to the HuggingFace Hub
- This AI Research from China Introduces Consistent4D: A Novel Artificial Intelligence Approach for Generating 4D Dynamic Objects from Uncalibrated Monocular Videos
- This AI Paper Introduces RuLES: A New Machine Learning Framework for Assessing Rule-Adherence in Large Language Models Against Adversarial Attacks

Other:
- I quit my job at a brand-new Dollar General store after facing flooding, broken freezers, and frosty bathrooms
- Naming a species after a celebrity may do more harm than good
- A millennial who tests out side hustles explains why he recommends making user-generated content and other flexible options to earn some extra money quickly
- How working moms can make sure they don't get lost in the RTO conversation
- Digital detoxes can cut FOMO but may not make you any happier, study finds
- Hong Kong Race Points To World Rallycross Future Out Of The Flames
- Ethelyn Williamson Obituary - O. W. Wiley Mortuary - Houston - 2023 - Legacy.com
- Ask HN: How many of you still have a Facebook account?
- UFC 295 Results: 2 Massive Knockouts And 2 New Champions Crowned
- Tesla will sue you if you try to flip your low-VIN Cybertruck

Insights:
- WeWork's failure can be attributed to its decision to take on huge buildings, which ultimately led to its downfall.
- The mistreatment of employees at a Dollar General store highlights the challenges faced by workers in the retail industry.
- The unauthorized withdrawal of funds from a disabled individual's bank account raises concerns about the practices of student loan servicers.
- The sabotage of gas pipelines by a Ukrainian special forces colonel has geopolitical implications.
- Intel's knowledge of insecure AVX chips without taking action raises questions about the company's responsibility.
- Understanding indexes and their significance in PostgreSQL can enhance database management.
- The reemergence of Pepe the Frog in AI prompts highlights the potential for misuse and manipulation of AI models.
- The success and current positions of members of the 'PayPal Mafia' demonstrate the impact of their entrepreneurial endeavors.
- The pricing tiers and features of Amazon Music provide options for users based on their preferences and needs.
- Excessive use of Tesla Superchargers can lead to issues and experts address the concerns surrounding it.
- The revival of stand-alone DVRs targeting cord-cutters offers an alternative solution for recording and streaming content.
- The introduction of a European Sovereign Cloud by AWS caters to the specific needs of government agencies and regulated industries.
- Giskard's release of a bot that detects issues in machine learning models showcases the importance of quality control in AI development.
- The development of AI approaches for generating 4D dynamic objects and assessing rule-adherence in language models demonstrates advancements in the field.
- Fluctuating mortgage interest rates impact the housing market and can influence borrowing decisions.
- The implementation of a mansion tax in LA raises concerns for real estate agents and individuals affected by the tax.
- The anticipated decrease in investment in employee experiences suggests a shift in priorities for companies.
- The potential impact of generative AI on thinking processes raises questions about the implications and consequences of this technology.
- The challenges faced by working moms in the return-to-office conversation require attention and support.
- Digital detoxes may not necessarily lead to increased happiness despite reducing FOMO.
- The Hong Kong Race highlights the potential future of World Rallycross.
- The obituary of Ethelyn Williamson reflects on the life and legacy of an individual.
- The discussion surrounding Facebook account ownership reveals varying perspectives on the platform's usage.
- The results of UFC 295 showcase the excitement and achievements in the world of mixed martial arts.
- Tesla's stance on flipping low-VIN Cybertrucks emphasizes the company's commitment to maintaining control over its products.
